logline: In a bustling early 20th-century factory, three young workers engage in playful antics, finding joy and camaraderie amidst their hard labor.

background.description: A bustling factory filled with clanking machines and a lively atmosphere.

characters.name: BOB
characters.description: 20s, wiry, with a cheeky smile, always looking for a laugh.
characters.prompt: Wiry young man with a cheeky smile, mimicking heavy lifting.

characters.name: ALICE
characters.description: 20s, strong-willed, with a quick wit, often rolling her eyes.
characters.prompt: Strong-willed young woman, laughing and shaking her head.

characters.name: TED
characters.description: 20s, stocky, the gentle giant, laughs easily but is the butt of the jokes.
characters.prompt: Stocky young man, flexing muscles and winking.

beats.description: The factory hums with machinery; BOB turns to ALICE and TED with a mischievous glint.
BOB mimes holding a heavy weight, straining amusingly, then drops it with a clatter.
ALICE snorts, covering her mouth to stifle laughter; TED looks confused.
ALICE gestures to BOB, exaggeratingly shaking her head, then pretends to lift an imaginary weight.
TED chuckles, mimicking ALICE but overdoing it, pretending to be incredibly strong.
BOB pretends to struggle with another imaginary weight, stumbling comically.
ALICE laughs, shaking her head, then points at TED, asking if he has a spot for BOB.
TED feigns seriousness, nods as if considering, then bursts out laughing; they all join in.
Their laughter echoes through the factory as the scene fades out.
